Initializes a new instance of the CloudJob class.

public CloudJob(string id = null, string displayName = null, bool ? usesTaskDependencies = null, string url = null, string eTag = null, DateTime? lastModified = null, DateTime? creationTime = null, JobState? state = null, DateTime? stateTransitionTime = null, JobState? previousState = null, DateTime? previousStateTransitionTime = null, int ? priority = null, JobConstraints constraints = null, JobManagerTask jobManagerTask = null, JobPreparationTask jobPreparationTask = null, JobReleaseTask jobReleaseTask = null, IList<EnvironmentSetting> commonEnvironmentSettings = null, PoolInformation poolInfo = null, OnAllTasksComplete? onAllTasksComplete = null, OnTaskFailure? onTaskFailure = null, IList<MetadataItem> metadata = null, JobExecutionInformation executionInfo = null, JobStatistics stats = null)Public Sub New(id As String = Nothing, displayName As String = Nothing, usesTaskDependencies As Boolean? = Nothing, url As String = Nothing, eTag As String = Nothing, lastModified As Date? = Nothing, creationTime As Date? = Nothing, state As JobState? = Nothing, stateTransitionTime As Date? = Nothing, previousState As JobState? = Nothing, previousStateTransitionTime As Date? = Nothing, priority As Integer? = Nothing, constraints As JobConstraints = Nothing, jobManagerTask As JobManagerTask = Nothing, jobPreparationTask As JobPreparationTask = Nothing, jobReleaseTask As JobReleaseTask = Nothing, commonEnvironmentSettings As IList(Of EnvironmentSetting) = Nothing, poolInfo As PoolInformation = Nothing, onAllTasksComplete As OnAllTasksComplete? = Nothing, onTaskFailure As OnTaskFailure? = Nothing, metadata As IList(Of MetadataItem) = Nothing, executionInfo As JobExecutionInformation = Nothing, stats As JobStatistics = Nothing)
Parameters
id
String String

A string that uniquely identifies the job within the account.

displayName
String String

The display name for the job.

usesTaskDependencies
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

The flag that determines if this job will use tasks with dependencies.

url
String String

The URL of the job.

eTag
String String

The ETag of the job.

lastModified
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

The last modified time of the job.

creationTime
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

The creation time of the job.

state
Nullable<JobState> Nullable(Of JobState)

The current state of the job.

stateTransitionTime
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

The time at which the job entered its current state.

previousState
Nullable<JobState> Nullable(Of JobState)

The previous state of the job.

previousStateTransitionTime
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

The time at which the job entered its previous state.

priority
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The priority of the job.

constraints
JobConstraints JobConstraints

The execution constraints for the job.

jobManagerTask
JobManagerTask JobManagerTask

Details of a Job Manager task to be launched when the job is started.

jobPreparationTask
JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask

The Job Preparation task.

jobReleaseTask
JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask

The Job Release task.

commonEnvironmentSettings
IList<EnvironmentSetting> IList(Of EnvironmentSetting)

The list of common environment variable settings. These environment variables are set for all tasks in the job (including the Job Manager, Job Preparation and Job Release tasks).

poolInfo
PoolInformation PoolInformation

The pool settings associated with the job.

onAllTasksComplete
Nullable<OnAllTasksComplete> Nullable(Of OnAllTasksComplete)

The action the Batch service should take when all tasks in the job are in the completed state.

onTaskFailure
Nullable<OnTaskFailure> Nullable(Of OnTaskFailure)

The action the Batch service should take when any task in the job fails. A task is considered to have failed if it completes with a non-zero exit code and has exhausted its retry count, or if it had a scheduling error.

metadata
IList<MetadataItem> IList(Of MetadataItem)

A list of name-value pairs associated with the job as metadata.

executionInfo
JobExecutionInformation JobExecutionInformation

The execution information for the job.

stats
JobStatistics JobStatistics

Resource usage statistics for the entire lifetime of the job.

Properties

CommonEnvironmentSettings CommonEnvironmentSettings

Edit

Gets or sets the list of common environment variable settings. These environment variables are set for all tasks in the job (including the Job Manager, Job Preparation and Job Release tasks).

public IList<EnvironmentSetting> CommonEnvironmentSettings { get; set; }Public Property CommonEnvironmentSettings As IList(Of EnvironmentSetting)
Value
IList<EnvironmentSetting> IList(Of EnvironmentSetting)

Constraints Constraints

Edit

Gets or sets the execution constraints for the job.

public JobConstraints Constraints { get; set; }Public Property Constraints As JobConstraints
Value
JobConstraints JobConstraints

CreationTime CreationTime

Edit

Gets or sets the creation time of the job.

public DateTime? CreationTime { get; set; }Public Property CreationTime As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

DisplayName DisplayName

Edit

Gets or sets the display name for the job.

public string DisplayName { get; set; }Public Property DisplayName As String
Value
String String

ETag ETag

Edit

Gets or sets the ETag of the job.

public string ETag { get; set; }Public Property ETag As String
Value
String String

Remarks

This is an opaque string. You can use it to detect whether the job has changed between requests. In particular, you can be pass the ETag when updating a job to specify that your changes should take effect only if nobody else has modified the job in the meantime.

ExecutionInfo ExecutionInfo

Edit

Gets or sets the execution information for the job.

public JobExecutionInformation ExecutionInfo { get; set; }Public Property ExecutionInfo As JobExecutionInformation
Value
JobExecutionInformation JobExecutionInformation

Id Id

Edit

Gets or sets a string that uniquely identifies the job within the account.

public string Id { get; set; }Public Property Id As String
Value
String String

Remarks

The ID can contain any combination of alphanumeric characters including hyphens and underscores, and cannot contain more than 64 characters. It is common to use a GUID for the id.

JobManagerTask JobManagerTask

Edit

Gets or sets details of a Job Manager task to be launched when the job is started.

public JobManagerTask JobManagerTask { get; set; }Public Property JobManagerTask As JobManagerTask
Value
JobManagerTask JobManagerTask

JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask

Edit

Gets or sets the Job Preparation task.

public JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask { get; set; }Public Property JobPreparationTask As JobPreparationTask
Value
JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask

Remarks

The Job Preparation task is a special task run on each node before any other task of the job.

JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask

Edit

Gets or sets the Job Release task.

public JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask { get; set; }Public Property JobReleaseTask As JobReleaseTask
Value
JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask

Remarks

The Job Release task is a special task run at the end of the job on each node that has run any other task of the job.

LastModified LastModified

Edit

Gets or sets the last modified time of the job.

public DateTime? LastModified { get; set; }Public Property LastModified As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

Remarks

This is the last time at which the job level data, such as the job state or priority, changed. It does not factor in task-level changes such as adding new tasks or tasks changing state.

Metadata Metadata

Edit

Gets or sets a list of name-value pairs associated with the job as metadata.

public IList<MetadataItem> Metadata { get; set; }Public Property Metadata As IList(Of MetadataItem)
Value
IList<MetadataItem> IList(Of MetadataItem)

Remarks

The Batch service does not assign any meaning to metadata; it is solely for the use of user code.

OnAllTasksComplete OnAllTasksComplete

Edit

Gets or sets the action the Batch service should take when all tasks in the job are in the completed state.

public OnAllTasksComplete? OnAllTasksComplete { get; set; }Public Property OnAllTasksComplete As OnAllTasksComplete?
Value
Nullable<OnAllTasksComplete> Nullable(Of OnAllTasksComplete)

Remarks

noAction - do nothing. The job remains active unless terminated or disabled by some other means. terminateJob - terminate the job. The job's terminateReason is set to 'AllTasksComplete'. The default is noAction. Possible values include: 'noAction', 'terminateJob'

OnTaskFailure OnTaskFailure

Edit

Gets or sets the action the Batch service should take when any task in the job fails. A task is considered to have failed if it completes with a non-zero exit code and has exhausted its retry count, or if it had a scheduling error.

public OnTaskFailure? OnTaskFailure { get; set; }Public Property OnTaskFailure As OnTaskFailure?
Value
Nullable<OnTaskFailure> Nullable(Of OnTaskFailure)

Remarks

noAction - do nothing. performExitOptionsJobAction - take the action associated with the task exit condition in the task's exitConditions collection. (This may still result in no action being taken, if that is what the task specifies.) The default is noAction. Possible values include: 'noAction', 'performExitOptionsJobAction'

PoolInfo PoolInfo

Edit

Gets or sets the pool settings associated with the job.

public PoolInformation PoolInfo { get; set; }Public Property PoolInfo As PoolInformation
Value
PoolInformation PoolInformation

PreviousState PreviousState

Edit

Gets or sets the previous state of the job.

public JobState? PreviousState { get; set; }Public Property PreviousState As JobState?
Value
Nullable<JobState> Nullable(Of JobState)

Remarks

This property is not set if the job is in its initial Active state. Possible values include: 'active', 'disabling', 'disabled', 'enabling', 'terminating', 'completed', 'deleting'

PreviousStateTransitionTime PreviousStateTransitionTime

Edit

Gets or sets the time at which the job entered its previous state.

public DateTime? PreviousStateTransitionTime { get; set; }Public Property PreviousStateTransitionTime As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

Remarks

This property is not set if the job is in its initial Active state.

Priority Priority

Edit

Gets or sets the priority of the job.

public int ? Priority { get; set; }Public Property Priority As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

Remarks

Priority values can range from -1000 to 1000, with -1000 being the lowest priority and 1000 being the highest priority. The default value is 0.

State State

Edit

Gets or sets the current state of the job.

public JobState? State { get; set; }Public Property State As JobState?
Value
Nullable<JobState> Nullable(Of JobState)

Remarks

Possible values include: 'active', 'disabling', 'disabled', 'enabling', 'terminating', 'completed', 'deleting'

StateTransitionTime StateTransitionTime

Edit

Gets or sets the time at which the job entered its current state.

public DateTime? StateTransitionTime { get; set; }Public Property StateTransitionTime As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

Stats Stats

Edit

Gets or sets resource usage statistics for the entire lifetime of the job.

public JobStatistics Stats { get; set; }Public Property Stats As JobStatistics
Value
JobStatistics JobStatistics

Url Url

Edit

Gets or sets the URL of the job.

public string Url { get; set; }Public Property Url As String
Value
String String

UsesTaskDependencies UsesTaskDependencies

Edit

Gets or sets the flag that determines if this job will use tasks with dependencies.

public bool ? UsesTaskDependencies { get; set; }Public Property UsesTaskDependencies As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

Methods

Validate() Validate()

Edit

Validate the object.

public virtual void Validate()Public Overridable Sub Validate
